data.quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Donâ€™t read success stories, you will only get a message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success.
data.author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Love your Job, but never fall in love with your Company.
data.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

data.quote: None can destroy iron, but its own rust can! Likewise none can destroy a person, but its own mindset can!
data.author: Ratan Tata

data.quote: If you are born with fame, it is an accident. If you die with fame, it is an achievement.
data.author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Its not always you get to hit the iron when it is hot. I believe in hitting it so hard, that it gets hot.
data.author: Lakshmi Mittal

data.quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small.
data.author: Azim Premji

data.quote: Ups and downs in life are very important to keep us going, because a straight line even in an ECG means we are not alive.
data.author: Ratan Tata

data.quote: Every new experience brings its own maturity and a greater clarity of vision.
data.author: Indira Gandhi

data.quote: You cannot get into business for the fashion of it.
data.author: Azim Premji

data.quote: Life is a continuous process of adjustment.
data.author: Indira Gandhi

data.quote: The focus is what is right before you - to give it your best. It sows the seeds of tomorrow.
data.author: Kiran Bedi

data.quote: Some people come in our life as blessings. Some come in your life as lessons.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Our greatest ability as humans is not to change the world; but to change ourselves.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Ignorance is always afraid of change.
data.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

data.quote: Everything is easy when you are busy. But nothing is easy when you are lazy.
data.author: Swami Vivekanand

data.quote: Don't see others doing better than you, beat your own records everyday, because success is a fight between you and yourself.
data.author: Chandrashekhar Azad

data.quote: Better remain silent, better not even think, if you are not prepared to act.
data.author: Annie Besant

data.quote: It is very simple to be happy, but it is very difficult to be simple.
data.author: Rabindranath Tagore

data.quote: Talk to yourself atleast once in a Day.. OtherwisDon't see others doing better than you, beat your own records everyday, because success is a fight between you and yourself.e you may miss a meeting with an EXCELLENT person in this world.
data.author: Swami Vivekanand
